cause.description:
Erin is like any other college student who did not receive enough money from the government to attend college for free. And it does cost a lot of money that she still does not have. Please help her!
1. Erin does not need to be in debt.
2. Erin does not deserve to be in debt.
3. PLEASE HELP HER!
cause.mission: raise money so Erin can attend college
cause.name: Help Erin Go To College
